title: FWF Erwin Schr√∂dinger Fellowships including a return phase
body:
• Promotion of scientific work at leading foreign research institutions; gaining experience abroad during the postdoc-phase
- facilitation of access to new scientific areas, methods, procedures and techniques so as to contribute - following return to Austria - to the further development of science in Austria


Additional Information

Benefits

  • Employment contract with full social security: no
  • Currency: euro
  • Covers salary: yes
  • Covers travel and subsistence: yes
  • Covers research costs: no
  • Covers other costs: Fellowship abroad: EUR 30.000 bis EUR 36.700 per year, tax free, the amount depends on the destination. Lump sum for children; up to EUR 1.600 p.a. for attending scientific meetings.

    For the return phase: contract of employment with Senior-Postdoc salary + EUR 10.000,- p.a.

  • Maximum duration of fellowship: 36

Eligibility criteria

  • completed doctoral studies
  • international scientific publications
  • invitation from the foreign research institution
  • If a return phase is requested: confirmation of the Austrian research institution
  • Applicants must (at the time the application is submitted) have been based in Austria for at least three of the previous ten years and must return to Austrian science.

Eligibility of fellows: country/ies of residence:

  • Austria

Eligibility of fellows: nationality/ies:

  • All

Selection process

By the FWF Board based on an international review process.

Additional comments

  • Contact phone: 0043 1 505 67 40 8504
  • Programme website: http://www.fwf.ac.at/en/research-funding/fwf-programmes/schroedinger-pro...
  • Annual budget: 4 Mio. Euro
  • Frequency of calls: continously
  • International mobility required: yes
